product_details.head: NC offers Housing loan in a speedy manner
li: CUB offers two-wheelers loans to individuals(Salaried/Self Employed) for new vehicles
Eligibility : 10 months net take home pay in case of salaried employee(maximum)/50% of the gross annual income declared in the lastest ITR in case of non salaried group(maximum)
Loan amount : maximum of Rs. 1.5 Lakhs
Click here for Interest rate and required documents
